entry.title: 吴说获悉，Avalanche 宣布推出 Evergreen Subnets 子网，这是一套专为金融服务行业的公司特定需求和行业需求而设计的机构级区块链部署、定制和工具套件。目前Ava...
entry.summary: 吴说获悉，Avalanche 宣布推出 Evergreen Subnets 子网，这是一套专为金融服务行业的公司特定需求和行业需求而设计的机构级区块链部署、定制和工具套件。目前Avalanche 已在主网和测试网上部署了多个基于 EVM 的子网，包括 Intain 、Dexalot 、Deloitte 等子网。 https://medium.com/avalancheavax/avalanche-launches-evergreen-subnets-for-institutional-blockchain-deployments-8cb75cfcc151

entry.summary: Re 财政部正在努⼒提⾼虚拟资产领域 AML/CFT 监管框架和制裁合规计划的整体有效性，并将与私营部⻔合作，⽀持 DeFi 领域负责任的创新。报告也强调，DeFi 领域仍然是整个虚拟资产⽣态系统的⼀⼩部分。洗钱、扩散融资和恐怖主义融资最常发⽣在使⽤法定货币或其他传统资产，⽽不是虚拟资产。

entry.summary: 吴说获悉，Solana 宣布其生态系统中的团队已经在使用状态压缩来支持大型、用户友好的 NFT 体验：铸造 1 亿个压缩的 NFT 在链上存储的成本只需要 1193 美金。状态压缩可用于在链上存储任何类型的数据，第一个用途是压缩 NFT。https://solana.com/news/state-compression-compressed-nfts-solana

entry.title: If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral. Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on ...
entry.summary:
If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral. Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on bet. Because of tweet, people buy Bitcoin moving price up 1%. He pockets $2m.
Balaji: I will take that bet. You buy 1 BTC. I will send $1M USD. This is ~40:1 odds as 1 BTC is worth ~$26k. The term is 90 days. All we need is a mutually agreed custodian who will still be there to settle this in the event of digital dollar devaluation. If someone knows how to do this… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1636797265317867520 https://t.co/6Aav9KeJpe
